model_question: I just started, what do I need to know about my computer and how I get paid?
model_answer: ACME Corp processes payroll on a bi-weekly basis. Pay stubs are available on the 15th and last day of each month via the employee portal. Direct deposit is mandatory. All new employees at ACME Corp receive a new MacBook Pro on their first day. Please see IT to comple setup. All software must be approved by IT.

model_question: How many vacation days do I get per year?
model_answer: Full-time employees receive 20 vacation days per year.
Annual performance reviews are conducted every November, with informal mid-year check-ins in May.

model_question: What is the maximum I can claim for a client dinner?
model_answer: The reimbursement limit for client meals is $50 per person.

model_question: Can I carry over unused vacation days?
model_answer: Yes, you can roll over up to a maximum of 5 unused vacation days to the next calendar year. These expire on March 31st.

model_question: How do I submit an expense report?
model_answer: All expense reports must be submitted through the Concur portal within 30 days.

model_question: What is the first step in the performance review process?
model_answer: The process begins with a self-assessment by the employee.

model_question: I need to book travel for a client visit and take a day off afterwards, what are the procedures?
model_answer: For travel, you must seek pre-approval and submit expenses via the Concur portal. For the day off, you must request it via the employee portal at least two weeks in advance.

model_question: What's the policy on professional conduct during business trips, and how do I file expenses?
model_answer: Employees must maintain the highest ethical standards. Expense reports must be submitted through the Concur portal.

model_question: I had to buy some software for a project, can I expense it?
model_answer: All software must be approved by IT. The expense policy does not specify reimbursement for software, only for travel, accommodation, and client meals.
